posts.postText:
How to play snake on Youtube:

Go to a video

Let it load for a sec

Once it starts playing, pause it.

Hold the left key.

Keep holding it for like 2 seconds.

Press the down key while still holding the left key.

Release both keys.

Ta da! Insta-snake!

(You have to think quick and it takes a few seconds getting used to.)

i've known this for a while too mainly since im a youtube tard

anyways moved to tips and tricks
I always find it really hard to do without screwing up where you are in the video.  I guess its more of an easter egg than a game.
